attributes.action: Give Police Community Support Officers Full Police Powers Like Other Police Officers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently there is no set standard for PCSO's and we the public undersigned are confused by what the role of a PCSO Police Constable is, because they are over paid but they don't have police powers or the right equipment we expect them to have if they are here to protect us in the 21st century world or terrorism and gun crime. Gordon please give PCSO's full police powers, full police training and personal protection equipment in the same way as you equipt your other police officers.
